targets.expr: quantile(0.5, rate(velor_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

quantile by (state) (0.5, sum by (state, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_processed_txns_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", state!="success"}[$interval])))

quantile by (kind) (0.5, sum by (kind, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_processed_txns_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", state!="success"}[$interval])))

quantile by (account, name) (0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, account, name) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="true", account!="core"}[$interval])))

quantile by (account, name, state) (0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, account, name, state) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="true", state!="keep_success"}[$interval])))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 100 * (failed_count / total_count) as failure_percent, failed_count, total_count, SPLIT(fun, "::")[OFFSET(1)] as module, SPLIT(fun, "::")[OFFSET(2)] as method
FROM (
  SELECT fun, SUM(failed_count) as failed_count, ARRAY_AGG((vm_status, failed_count)) AS vm_statuses
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(json_payload, "$.function") as fun, 
      vm_status,
      SUM(1) as failed_count
    FROM `analytics-test-345723.indexer_mainnet_gcp.transactions_view` 
    WHERE success=false and $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
    GROUP BY fun, vm_status
  ) z
  WHERE NOT(fun LIKE "0x1::%") AND NOT(fun LIKE "0x3::%")
  GROUP BY fun
) a
JOIN (
  SELECT entry_function_id_str, SUM(1) as total_count
  FROM `analytics-test-345723.indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions`
  where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  GROUP BY entry_function_id_str
) b
ON fun = entry_function_id_str
ORDER BY total_count DESC, failed_count DESC
LIMIT 30

targets.expr: quantile (0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="true", state!="keep_success", account="user"}[$interval]))) / quantile (0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="true", account="user"}[$interval])))

((quantile by (account, name) (0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, account, name) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="true", state!="keep_success"}[$interval]))) > 0.1) / quantile by (account, name) (0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, account, name) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="true"}[$interval])))) < 1.1

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 100 * (failed_count / total_count) as failure_percent, failed_count, SPLIT(fun, "::")[OFFSET(1)] as module, SPLIT(fun, "::")[OFFSET(2)] as method, vm_status
FROM (
  SELECT 
    JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(json_payload, "$.function") as fun, 
    vm_status,
    SUM(1) as failed_count
  FROM `analytics-test-345723.indexer_mainnet_gcp.transactions_view` 
  WHERE success=false and $__timeFilter(inserted_at) AND NOT(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(json_payload, "$.function") LIKE "0x1::%") AND NOT(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(json_payload, "$.function") LIKE "0x3::%")
  GROUP BY fun, vm_status

) a
JOIN (
  SELECT entry_function_id_str, SUM(1) as total_count
  FROM `analytics-test-345723.indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions`
  where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  GROUP BY entry_function_id_str
) b
ON fun = entry_function_id_str
ORDER BY failed_count DESC
LIMIT 30

quantile by (account, state) (0.5, sum by (account, state) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="false"}[$interval])))

quantile by (account, name) (0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, account, name) (rate(velor_processed_user_transactions_entry_function_by_module{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", is_detailed="true"}[$interval])))
